author: node_dood
content: How is it refunded for other transactions?

author: ralexstokes
content:
when you make a transaction you end up in all cases with an effective gas price and a maximum gas limit

your account must be able to pay for this gas price * gas limit which you can think about being escrowed for the duration of your transactions execution

if you end up spending less gas than your gas limit, you get a "refund" which is returned from the "escrow" to your account
